t: Introducing Amazon Autos: Buy your next car on Amazon in 48 US cities
s: December 10, 2024 - Customers in 48 U.S. cities can buy new Hyundai vehicles from their local participating dealer directly on Amazon.

t: Amazon is officially in the online car sales business | TechCrunch
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon is kicking off the new endeavor with Hyundai in 48 U.S. cities, including Atlanta, Boston, Chicago, Los Angeles, and New York. The launch comes a little more than a year since the e-commerce giant announced plans to start selling vehicles on its website in the second half of 2024.

t: Amazon Autos to Help Dealers Sell Used Cars | PYMNTS.com
s: March 19, 2025 - Amazon plans to start helping dealers sell used cars as well as new ones, according to Fan Jin, director and general manager of Amazon Autos.

t: Amazon starts selling Hyundai cars, more brands coming for 2025 - Off-Ramp - Leasehackr Forum
s: December 11, 2024 - I want to compare Amazon’s pricing to what we see here on the forums in finding our own deals, and also what the brokers are offering.

t: Amazon’s online car ‘dealership’ with Hyundai is now live | The Verge
s: December 10, 2024 - “With Amazon Autos, we’re bringing the simplicity and ease customers expect from Amazon to car shopping, one of their largest purchases, while offering dealers a new channel to connect with a broad audience,” Fan Jin, global head of Amazon Autos, said in a statement.

t: Amazon Autos - Sell cars online | Sell on Amazon
s: Harness the power of Amazon to connect with the growing number of customers who want to buy vehicles online.

t: Exclusive: Amazon's in-car software deal with Stellantis fizzles | Reuters
s: 1 week ago - Amazon's deal with Stellantis to create in-car software that the companies hoped would transform the driving experience while bolstering their vehicle-tech credentials is "winding down," the companies confirmed after a Reuters inquiry.

t: Amazon Is Now Selling Hyundai Vehicles Through Amazon Autos | WIRED
s: December 10, 2024 - Amazon’s partnership with Hyundai means you can use the e-retailer to purchase a brand-new car online. More manufacturers will be joining the new service, called Amazon Autos, next year.

t: Starting Today You Can Buy a Car on Amazon in These 6 Cities - Newsweek
s: January 7, 2025 - The Korean Hyundai brand now has several vehicles available to 'Add to Cart' on the Amazon's website

t: You’ll Be Able Buy Cars on Amazon Next Year | WIRED
s: November 18, 2023 - Plus: Sonos teases a new product, WIRED cover star Simone Giertz has a new invention, and the hackers behind one of the largest ever cyberattacks finally tell their story.

t: Amazon and Hyundai launch a broad, strategic partnership—including vehicle sales on Amazon.com in 2024
s: Hyundai has also selected AWS as its preferred cloud provider and next-generation Hyundai vehicles will be even more responsive and interactive with Alexa Built-in.
